messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Anyone in/near southern Indiana?
messages.msgSnippet: ... We re trying not to discuss local issues on this list. http://sandradodd.com/local There are ideas there, but this list isn t for local discussions. Sandra
messages.messageBody:
On Jan 13, 2006, at 3:20 PM, leobellalace@... wrote:

> I was curious to see how many (if any) are around this area? We
> are in southern Indiana (in the middle.)


We're trying not to discuss local issues on this list.
http://sandradodd.com/local

There are ideas there, but this list isn't for local discussions.

Sandra
